DOC.brief_summary: To provide a research tool enabling physicians to monitor long term clinical outcomes for patients undergoing gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) treatment with EndoStim LES Stimulation System.
DOC.criteria: Subject signs informed consent Subject has a planned EndoStim LES Stimulation System implant (prospective) OR subject has already had his/her EndoStim LES Stimulation System implant (retrospective) Subject is contraindicated for implantation of the EndoStim LES Stimulation System implant Significant cardiac arrhythmia, ectopy, or significant cardiovascular disease Pregnant or nursing Subject is less than 22 years old or greater than 75 years old
